name: Phoenix Rising: A Tale of Four Sisters
name_original: Phoenix Rising: A Tale of Four Sisters
description:
You are a real estate agent, and you've been given the task of selling a house that has been empty for years. No one is biting. Just when you think all hope is lost, you stumble upon a Phoenix familiar looking for her witch. It turns out that she's gone, and needs a new witch! It's your job to convince the four daughters to buy the house and take on the familiar. First, you need to find out why they're so angry with each other...

This game includes a roster of interesting and unique characters to interact with! 

Alice

Summer

Agnes

Elias

Character art by @songquill on Instagram 

Music design by @samsure_ on Instagram
